thread.title: David Kerr
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by David Kerr

author: David Kerr
title: David Kerr
text:
The Pacuare lodge was a once in a lifetime experience. Not for everyone, but a thrill for the person that isnt ready to climp Mt Everest, but still has adventure in their blood.
Arenal was lovely - the hot springs at Arenal Springs and resort were heavenly - regardless of the torrential rain! Never saw the volcano - visitors rarely see the volcano - thoroughly enjoyed our stay regardless - Zip lining in the rain was awesome !
Parador was the highlight. Spectacular terraced pools overlooking the Pacific, wildlife everywhere, comfortable room, good food, Manuel Antonio beach is one of the nicest beaches I have ever been to - if I could only go to one location, it would be to the Parador resort - over the top in every way!
Bring plenty on singles and $5 bills - spent approx $250 in tips. The staff, drivers & tour guides expect it, and deserves it.
